instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00850 A1989
threads.message:
Hi everyone.

This machine when I disconnect the flex from the battery, it generates 20V and turns on.

The machine has a problem that the touch bar works but does not show an image.

suggestions? Thank you!

threads.title: 820-00850 A1989
threads.message:
Check if ALS works properly.
KB backlight is working?

Check J5110 voltages (touchbar connected).

threads.title: 820-00850 A1989
threads.message:
keyboard light works

The J5110 voltages are present, the problem is that PPBUS_G3H is not generated with the battery...

threads.title: 820-00850 A1989
threads.message:
What's the problem there?
No touchbar backlight, or missing PPBUS_G3H with charger and battery connected at same time?

threads.title: 820-00850 A1989
threads.message:
the problem is two.

there is no ppbus with the battery connected...

If I only connect the charger "WITHOUT THE BATTERY connected" the machine turns on.

The touch bar is another problem.

if there is ppbus with the battery connected but when disconnecting the charger, the equipment turns off.

The machine recognizes the battery and shows the percentage.

threads.title: 820-00850 A1989
threads.message:
"there is no ppbus with the battery connected
-------------------------
if there is ppbus with the battery connected
-----------------------------
The machine recognizes the battery and shows the percentage"
Please, help us to understand you.

threads.title: 820-00850 A1989
threads.message:
Believe it or not, that happened to me, but it's already working with the battery.

Now I focus on the touchbar, in the system preferences it is recognizing it, I even pressed it and the volume symbol was activated... the problem is that it does not light up...

The keyboard dims when you cover the camera.
